import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Products from '../products' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const product = products.find(p=>p._id===match.params.id) return<> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: {product.price} Sale Price: {product.salePrice} Description: {product.description} Price: {product.salePrice} } export default ProductScreen
